document.full_text: real madrid, playing down a man for most of the second half, rallied for a 1-1 tie against spanish leader barcelona on a late penalty kick by christiano ronaldo.
document.title: real madrid 1, barcelona 1: madrid rallies for draw against barcelona
lines_and_colors: real madrid, playing down a man for most of the second half, rallied for a 1-1 tie against spanish leader barcelona on a late penalty kick by christiano ronaldo.
